Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Marina Mandarin, you'll be centrally located in Singapore, steps from Marina Square and minutes from CityLink Mall. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Haji Lane and Chinatown Heritage Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 575 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy body treatments and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a steam room. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and limo/town car service. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A train station pick-up service is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Marina Square - 0.1 km / 0 mi
CityLink Mall - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Esplanade Mall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Parco Marina Bay - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Millenia Walk - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Suntec Singapore - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Suntec City - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Esplanade Park - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Esplanade Theatres - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Civilian War Memorial - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Saint Andrew's Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Raffles City - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bras Basah Complex - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Singapore City Hall - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
CHIJMES - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

The preferred airport for Marina Mandarin is Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 16.2 km / 10.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: Rates not applicable for singapore citizens / permanent residents. 100% charges for no show / early departure. **Restaurant is Halal-Certified**. Market specific rate available. UPCOMING HOTEL REJUVENATION WORK Hotel interior rejuvenation project will commence in late October 2018, and is expected to be completed in March 2019. The cosmetic refresh of our Deluxe, Executive Deluxe and Premier rooms will see new furniture, carpet and a bathroom that is retro-fitted with enhanced rain shower and vanity mirror, all in an effort to provide our guests with a revitalized hotel experience of contemporary comfort. Hotel apologize in advance for any inconvenience that room guests may face during the project period. No Twin Bedded rooms from 23-Apr to 3-May-2019 inclusive.
